text:
Bằng email này, Chúng tôi trân trọng thông báo đến Quý Khách hàng Thông báo số tiền cần thanh toán đợt cấp Giấy chứng nhận, thanh toán các khoản phí và lệ phí để hoàn tất thủ tục.
Through this email, we would like to inform you of the payment amount for the Certificate issuance, including fees and charges to complete the procedure.
Chi tiết Quý Khách hàng vui lòng xem tại tệp tin đính kèm/Please see the attached file for details.
Trường hợp Quý Khách hàng cần hỗ trợ thì vui lòng liên hệ với Chúng tôi theo thông tin sau/If you need any support, please contact us via the following information:
Bộ phận/ Department:PHÒNG DỊCH VỤ KHÁCH HÀNG/CUSTOMER SERVICE
Hotline:[redacted_number]-[redacted_number] - [redacted_number] ([redacted_name] - [redacted_name] )
trans:
Through this email, we would like to inform you of the payment amount for the Certificate issuance, including fees and charges to complete the procedure.
Through this email, we would like to inform you of the payment amount for the Certificate issuance, including fees and charges to complete the procedure.
Please see the attached file for details.
If you need any support, please contact us via the following information:
Department: CUSTOMER SERVICE
Hotline:[redacted_number]-[redacted_number] - [redacted_number] ([redacted_name] - [redacted_name])
